message.content:
Sure, I can help with that. Here is how you would do it in Python using numpy library which provides functions for calculating statistics:

```python
import numpy as np

# your list of numbers
numbers = [10, 20, 30, 40]

average = np.mean(numbers) # calculate average
std_deviation = np.std(numbers) # calculate standard deviation

print("Average: ", average)
print("Standard Deviation: ", std_deviation)
```
Replace `[10, 20, 30, 40]` with your list of numbers to get the average and standard deviation.
